dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:

android_app_developer_1: Footyfocus.com
android_app_name_1:  
https://market.android.com/details?id=com.android.chelsea
companyname: Footyfocus.com
country_residence: GB
dmca_clarifications: Dear Sirs,

We do not have any club logos/crests as indicated by the Peter Gregory from  
Chelsea FC. We take copyright seriously, and as such dont even include the  
club name in our app (Chelsea FC)

Here are the links to icons/splash pages of the current app in question  
(absolutely no indication of crest/logo)

http://goo.gl/BDN6U  - icon,
http://goo.gl/3rba0 - splash page,

For reference, the official crest is here -  http://goo.gl/FyZ8t

To the contrary Mr Gregory has seems to have ignored other apps (less  
popular than our app) which blatantly infringed their Copyright.

We endevour to provide a very professional service to our users and request  
that our app be re-installed, so can continue to contribute to the Android  
ecosystem.

If there are any further questions, please email or call me anytime.

Regards

Zain
